response.overview: After 10 months of never receiving one message from the moderators of tmbd, one woman has decided to take a more drastic approach. After giving them ample time to respond when she asked how something that premiered in theatres across the United States of America did not meet the new content guidelines, she made a new entry on the website, hoping that whoever takes is down would have the decency to finally answer her. She didn't want to make a new entry, but no one has responded to a single message in ten months, so what other choice did she have?
response.tagline: I tried being cordial but my patience has run thin
response.title: Respond to my Messages, ASAP
